messages.subject: Nobuie
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone by chance have a copy of the Nakamura/Nobuie rubbings book from 1981 available for sale?  I have the original but would like a copy of the reprint.
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone by chance have a copy of the Nakamura/Nobuie rubbings book
from 1981 available for sale? I have the original but would like a
copy of the reprint.
I am also looking for a copy of the book 'Ko Kogai'.
Thanks much!
Pete Klein
